description: Sets the speed at which air resistance maxes out. Note: Air resistance ramps up exponentially up to this speed. Set it to a high value to flatten helicopter when it is done accelerating to move at the desired speed.

params.name: max air resistance speed
description: Speed at which air resistance maxes out (MPH).
